title: Firestoneish Font
content:
Hi all im new to the site. I have gotton some great information so far from all of you and I have a question. A customer of mine wants the words filling station in a font like the firestone logo. Does anybody know of a font that resembles the logo? Any help is greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130322013141im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_firestone_shield_6569.jpg)
author: edpace898

comments.content: Very original shape. [Badger](http://web.archive.org/web/20130322013141/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/red_rooster/badger_extra_bold/) has vaguely similar shapes.
That Bradley looks like a winner. Thank you.
